[00:00.00]Black Summer - Red Hot Chili Peppers (红辣椒乐队)
[00:04.61]Lyrics by：Anthony Kiedis/Flea/John Frusciante/Chad Smith
[00:09.23]A lazy rain am I
[00:13.00]
[00:13.88]The skies refuse to cry
[00:17.45]
[00:18.61]Cremation takes its piece of your supply
[00:25.55]
[00:27.85]The night is dressed like noon
[00:31.70]
[00:32.50]A sailor spoke too soon
[00:36.47]
[00:37.19]And China's on the dark side of the moon
[00:43.21]
[00:45.83]Hear me now
[00:46.71]
[00:56.30]Platypus are a few
[00:59.61]
[01:00.46]The secret life of Roo
[01:04.18]
[01:05.06]A personality I never knew
[01:10.99]
[01:12.50]Get it on
[01:13.32]
[01:14.27]My crater weighs a tonne
[01:17.67]
[01:18.90]The archer's on the run
[01:22.46]
[01:23.39]And no one stands alone behind the sun
[01:30.21]
[01:34.64]It's been a long time since I made a new band
[01:39.17]Waitin' on another black summer to end
[01:43.53]It's been a long time and you never know when
[01:47.57]
[01:48.20]Waitin' on another black summer to end
[01:52.08]
[02:32.56]Back the flaming whip
[02:35.55]

[02:46.96]
[02:50.73]It's been a long time since I made a new band
[02:55.14]Waitin' on another black summer to end
[02:59.44]It's been a long time and you never know when

[03:03.92]Waitin' on another black summer to end
[03:07.73]
[03:16.30]I've been waitin' I've been waitin'
[03:20.53]

[03:29.16]

data.trans:
[ti:Black Summer]
[ar:Red Hot Chili Peppers]
[al:Black Summer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.61]//
[00:09.23]我就像是一场懒洋洋的雨
[00:13.00]
[00:13.88]天空不愿降下甘霖
[00:17.45]
[00:18.61]肆虐的烈焰将吞噬你赖以生存的一切
[00:25.55]
[00:27.85]夜晚如正午一般明亮
[00:31.70]
[00:32.50]水手的语速飞快
[00:36.47]
[00:37.19]中国登上月之暗面
[00:43.21]
[00:45.83]现在请听我说
[00:46.71]
[00:56.30]鸭嘴兽濒临灭绝
[00:59.61]
[01:00.46]袋鼠的秘密生活
[01:04.18]
[01:05.06]一种我不曾了解的品格
[01:10.99]
[01:12.50]欣喜雀跃
[01:13.32]
[01:14.27]我留下的影响难以估量
[01:17.67]
[01:18.90]弓箭手奋力奔跑
[01:22.46]
[01:23.39]没有人能独自伫立在太阳背后
[01:30.21]
[01:34.64]自从我组建新乐队以后 已经过去很长时间了
[01:39.17]等待着另一个黑暗的夏日结束
[01:43.53]已经过去很长时间了 你无法知道时机何时来临
[01:47.57]
[01:48.20]等待着另一个黑暗的夏日结束
[01:52.08]
[02:32.56]抑制熊熊烈焰
[02:35.55]
[02:36.66]坦然接受检查 扬帆起航
[02:39.99]
[02:41.45]骑着无头骏马踏上旅途
[02:46.96]
[02:50.73]自从我组建新乐队以后 已经过去很长时间了
[02:55.14]等待着另一个黑暗的夏日结束

[03:03.33]

[03:16.30]我苦苦等待 我苦苦等待
